text:
Chicago, IL - Digital H2O - http://www.digitalh2o.com/ - Full Time - No Remote

- Senior Front-End Engineer | Seeking an engineer with strong experience in building single page applications in a modern framework - such as Ember.js, AngularJS or Backbone.js

- Senior Data Platform Engineer | Seeking an engineer with strong experience in Python and a love of gaining new insight from data.

Contact jobs+hn@digitalh2o.com or visit http://www.digitalh2o.com/careers for more info!
